author: gianugo
msg: A few bugfixes, more tests added and a small API change: now getRoles() returns a java.util.Collection instead than a String[]

author: gianugo
msg: Committed a first scratch implementation of security in Xindice, using a JAAS oriented approach. WARNING: This code ATM doesn't work yet, it's being committed for public review and personal comfort :-)

scrollbar appears for browsers that are maximized on
